General.Name: Australis Oil & Gas Ltd
General.Description: Australis Oil & Gas Limited, an upstream oil and gas company, engages in the oil and gas exploration, development, and production activities in the United States and internationally. The company operates through Oil & Gas Production, Exploration, and Other segments. It holds interest in the Tuscaloosa Marine Shale that consists of 33 producing wells covering an area of approximately 80,000 net acres located in Louisiana and Mississippi, the United States. Australis Oil & Gas Limited was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Subiaco, Australia.
